item0.title: Easy international shipping
item0.content: A wide range of services and door-to-door shipping options to solve your international export challenges, covering 220 countries across the globe

item1.title: Preferential business shipping rates
item1.content: With rates adapted to your shipping volume, it’s pricing that fits your business – not the other way around

item2.title: Flexible delivery options
item2.content: Your customers will benefit from our On Demand Delivery services, allowing them to decide when and where their package is delivered. That means less enquiries and fewer returns for you
